PANEL.PRO_FEATURE: This feature is part of OpenVidu PRO tier
PANEL.PAID_FEATURE: This feature is part of OpenVidu commercial service. Please contact us through commercial@openvidu.io for more information.

CHAT.TITLE: Chat
CHAT.SUBTITLE: Messages will be removed at the end of the session

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.CAPTIONS_LANG_TEXT: Select the language that the participants of the session will use. The captions will appear in that language.

RECORDING.TITLE: Recording
RECORDING.SUBTITLE: Record your meeting for posterity
RECORDING.CONTENT_SUBTITLE: When recording has finished you will be able to download it with ease
RECORDING.DELETE_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete the recording?
RECORDING.NO_MODERATOR: Only the MODERATOR can start the recording

STREAMING.TITLE: Streaming
STREAMING.SUBTITLE: Stream your meeting to your audience
STREAMING.CONTENT_SUBTITLE: OpenVidu need the url of the streaming platform.
STREAMING.NO_MODERATOR: Only the MODERATOR can start the streaming

ERRORS.SESSION: There was an error connecting to the session
ERRORS.RECONNECT: Oops! Trying to reconnect to the session...
ERRORS.TOGGLE_CAMERA: There was an error toggling camera
ERRORS.TOGGLE_MICROPHONE: There was an error toggling microhpone
ERRORS.SCREEN_SUPPORT: Your browser does not support screen sharing
ERRORS.MEDIA_ACCESS: Access to media devices was not allowed.
ERRORS.DEVICE_NOT_FOUND: No video or audio devices have been found. Please, connect at least one.
ERRORS.SST_CONNECTION: Connection lost. Reconnecting to the speech to text service ...
